entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 18 except 12 near Lake Erie.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers before morning with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 5:56 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 70%
